title: Silumgar Assassin
text: Creatures with power greater than Silumgar Assassin's power can't block it.Megamorph  (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for . Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)When Silumgar Assassin is turned face up, destroy target creature with power 3 or less an opponent controls.
